data.fit_access: Home Assistant access to Google Fit

application_credentials.description:
Follow the [instructions]({more_info_url}) for [OAuth consent screen]({oauth_consent_url}) to give Home Assistant access to your Google Fit. You also need to create Application Credentials linked to your Fit Account:
1. Go to [Credentials]({oauth_creds_url}) and click **Create Credentials**.
1. From the drop-down list select **OAuth client ID**.
1. Select **Web Application** for the Application Type and add 'https://my.home-assistant.io/redirect/oauth' as a redirect URI.
